sentences.en: " Miss -- Miss Courtland, " Bamberger faltered weakly.
sentences.cn: “ 柯 -- 柯脱兰小姐, " 班贝格结结巴巴地轻声说.

sentences.en: "I'm all right," Max said weakly, but his breathing came in jagged gasps.
sentences.cn: “我没事，”马克斯软弱无力地说，但他的呼吸却上气不接下气。

sentences.en: Down through the trees the wind whooshed weakly, like a sick child.
sentences.cn: 风慵懒地吹过树木，像个病殃殃的孩子。

sentences.en: He looked at the mess and smiled weakly.
sentences.cn: 他看着这一片狼藉,勉强地笑了笑.
他对着记者们勉强笑了笑。

sentences.en: He weakly pressed his arms against her sides.
It was Sally that did it, and Aleck weakly submitted.
sentences.cn: 这是萨利提议的, 艾莱柯心一软就顺从了.

sentences.en: Laura leaned weakly against the door.
She started to sit up, grimaced, and sank back weakly against the pillow.
sentences.cn: 她坐了起来，露出痛苦的表情，又有气无力地倒在枕头上。

sentences.en: She whispered a few words weakly before she fell down.
sentences.cn: 她虚弱地低声说了几句便昏倒了.

sentences.en: The doctor weakly puts the case that the mother-to-be has many relatives, so needs less support from the hospital.
sentences.cn: 那个大夫还草率认为这位准妈妈有不少亲戚，因此不需要医院过多的帮助。

sentences.en: The enemy rear is weakly defended.

sentences.cn: 这种矿物带有轻微的磁性。

sentences.en: When her associates addressed her in the wings she only smiled weakly.
sentences.cn: 当她的同伴们在舞台两侧招呼她时,她只是淡淡地笑笑.

words.tran_cn: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
虚弱地；无力地；软弱地；有病地
